book an intro call

human technology, not science-fiction

office-ngom is a critical technology thinking consultancy + research and development of mixed tech systems office.

we focus on the holistic integration of advanced technology into processes, through a human-centric perspective: why do you need technology, what does it do for you? what tech tools do you need to achieve social, financial or optimization goals for your company? we bring broad knowledge in the fields of strategic project development and advanced technology- from extended reality, to computer vision, machine learning, hardware development and industrial robotics and we funnel it down to designing lean solutions and giving expert advice.
